text: The London Transport Executive (LTE) was the organisation responsible for public transport in the Greater London area, England, United Kingdom, between 1948-1963. In common with all London transport authorities from 1933 to 2000, the public name and operational brand of the organization was London Transport. Category:1948 establishments in Europe Category:1962 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:1960s disestablishments in England Category:Defunct companies of the United Kingdom Category:Intermodal transport authorities Category:1940s establishments in England
title: London Transport Executive
